languages.text: "Да. Тяжело быть жестоким к той, кого любишь. Тебе ведомо это, Домин?"
"Yes. It is difficult to be cruel to someone you love. Have you come to know that, Domin?"
languages.original_text: "Да. Тяжело быть жестоким к той, кого любишь. Тебе ведомо это, Домин?"

traits.locale_text: "Yes. It is hard to be cruel toward someone you love. Have you known that, Enim?"

languages.text: « Oui. Et il n'est guère facile de se montrer cruel envers ceux que l'on aime. En avez-vous fait l'expérience, vous aussi, Domin ? »
languages.original_text: "Yes. It is difficult to be cruel to someone you love. Have you come to know that, Domin?"

traits.locale_text: « Oui. Et il n'est guère facile de se montrer cruel envers ceux que l'on aime. En avez-vous fait l'expérience, vous aussi, Domin ? »

languages.text: «Sí. Cuesta ser cruel con aquellos a los que amas. ¿Sabía eso, Domin?».
languages.original_text: "Yes. It is difficult to be cruel to someone you love. Have you come to know that, Domin?"

traits.locale_text: «Sí. Cuesta ser cruel con aquellos a los que amas. ¿Sabía eso, Domin?».

languages.text: 「えぇ、愛する者に残酷であるのは辛い。お分かりになりましょう、ドミン？」
languages.original_text: "Yes. It is difficult to be cruel to someone you love. Have you come to know that, Domin?"

traits.locale_text: 「えぇ、愛する者に残酷であるのは辛い。お分かりになりましょう、ドミン？」

languages.text: “没错，残忍对待深爱之人是件非常痛苦的事情。你现在已经明白这一点了吧，秘者？”
languages.original_text: "Yes. It is difficult to be cruel to someone you love. Have you come to know that, Domin?"

traits.locale_text: “没错，残忍对待深爱之人是件非常痛苦的事情。你现在已经明白这一点了吧，秘者？”

languages.text: "Ja. Es ist schwierig, grausam zu jemandem zu sein, den man liebt. Habt Ihr das erkannt, Domin?"
languages.original_text: "Yes. It is difficult to be cruel to someone you love. Have you come to know that, Domin?"

traits.locale_text: "Ja. Es ist schwierig, grausam zu jemandem zu sein, den man liebt. Habt Ihr das erkannt, Domin?"

languages.text: "Evet. Sevdiğin birine karşı gaddar olmak zordur. Bunu kavramayı başarabildiniz mi Domin?"
languages.original_text: "Yes. It is difficult to be cruel to someone you love. Have you come to know that, Domin?"
